lead_paragraph: Dale Earnhardt Jr. will not be taking his familiar No. 8 with him to Hendrick Motorsports next season. Earnhardt, who is leaving Dale Earnhardt Inc., has used the No. 8 since he entered the Cup Series in 1999. His late grandfather Ralph also used the number. D.E.I. had the right of first refusal on the No. 8, and Hendrick was unable to reach an agreement with D.E.I. for the number.
